name: Baldi's Basics REMASTERED TEXTURES!
description:
Welcome to Baldi's Basics Remastered Textures!

This is a mod that changes a few of the textures for better gameplay experience.

Please note that this mod was intended to only be made for me, so if you don't like anything I've done with the textures I don't intend on fixing them.

Mac, Linux, and Android versions will likely never come out.
